Trinity:

"What're you doing Grounded?" asked TRinity.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> OOC:Thanks.....it was annoying not being able to post for a 
while....
> 
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded looked to Trinity. 
> "Yes we will be safer now."
> He looked up to the main console and a small panel on his arm 
opened 
> up he began typing on it and all the sensors and radars, guns, and 
> everything came on line for Grounded to see. 
> "Now to check what this ship has."
> He checked and found the weapons room and the rest.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Glad to see you back Gunther.
> > 
> > Trinity:
> > 
> > 
> > "I did it... I did it!!!!! " shouted happyly the little-one "Do 
you 
> think that we're safe now??? that any mean-bot could hurt us 
> more??????"

> >   To: nbwrpg@y...

> >   Subject: The defense is BACK!!!
> > 
> > 
> >   ::Grounded::

button 
> she 
> >   pressed had indeed started the defenses once again. Gronded sat 
> down 
> >   and began his work at reprogarimming the defenses to best suit 
> thier 
> >   location. He began to program the guns to his control through 
his

> >   "this is perfect Trinity...you have found it...."
